attributes.action: I am asking in view of Brexit that English be reinstated on all legal forms.
attributes.background: All legal forms e,g electoral role,Benefit applications request me to put White European.not English

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition asking the Government to make "white English" an option on all government forms which ask people to give their ethnicity.
